member.name: T:OrchardCore.BackgroundTasks.Services.AlwaysHasChangedToken
member.summary: An empty change token that is always in the changed state but without raising any change callbacks.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.BackgroundTasks.Services.BackgroundTaskManager.LoadDocumentAsync
member.summary: Loads the background task document from the store for updating and that should not be cached.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.BackgroundTasks.Services.BackgroundTaskManager.GetDocumentAsync
member.summary: Gets the background task document from the cache for sharing and that should not be updated.
